page.title: 13DINGLE FARM SALES AND BUILD.
page.content: {Wheat}is sold to the grain merchant. {Potatoes}are sold through Woodbury Growers, a company formed by local farmers to market their produce. {Peas and beans}are grown for seed under contract. {Fruit,}one third of the crop is sold by 'Pick-Your-Own'method, and two thirds are sold by Woodbury Growers through Birmingham, Liverpool and Cardiff markets. { {Livestock }is sold through Meadow Valley Livestock a co-operative for selling livestock. The main farm is at Dingle Farm with a set of buildings at Hazelhurst. There is also a pig farrowing and fattening unit. There is a cold store for apples. Potato storage is at Woodbury Growers. Grain is stored at No. 13 Syndicate.
